name: Luna
description: Playful and affectionate, Luna loves to cuddle and sunbathe by the window.

name: Milo
description: Milo is curious and brave, always the first to explore new places.

name: Nala
description: Gentle and majestic, Nala is a calm presence who loves brushing sessions.

name: Simba
description: Energetic and fun, Simba enjoys toys and chasing laser lights.

name: Chloe
description: Independent and smart, Chloe appreciates quiet moments and gentle company.

name: Oreo
description: Oreo is sweet and friendly, always ready to greet visitors with purrs.
